articles.title: Sotaire Kwizera

              Sotaire Kwizera

            Bio
            I am Sotaire Kwizera from Burundi, one of the poorest
            countries in the world. Life hardships have taught me that
            getting educated is the only promising way out of poverty. I
            believe in the power of numbers to make this world an
            inclusive and welcoming place to everybody. I want to use my
            passion for economics and data analytics to develop
            innovative ideas to boost developing countries’ living
            standards and achieve sustainable development. As I progress
            in my higher education journey, I am open to any internship,
            research, and job opportunities that would help me acquire
            professional experience and step closer to fulfilling my
            dreams.
            
            
            Education
            Massachusetts Institute of Technology |
            Cambridge, MA
            Ph.D. in Computer Science | September 2009 - May 2014
            The University of California, Berkeley |
            Berkeley, CA
            B.S. in Computer Science | September 2005 - May 2009
            
            
            Experience
            Google Brain | Principal Investigator |
            January 2018 - Present
            Netflix | Research Scientist | June 2014
            - December 2017
            
          
        
      
    

    
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Sotaire Kwizera
